post_detail.description:
What this case study demonstrates: 
Our ability to produce 19 informational, localized videos for six different brands over the course of one week.  

Background: 
Click 3X created instructional videos, which accompanied a new global print rebranding campaign. The videos were distributed in 54 different countries.  


Execution:
All the videos were shot in a simple, visual style with voiceovers. The videos consisted primarily of beauty tips. Shooting with voiceover allowed us to speed up the process, and made it easier to translate into other languages.
